title: oeyoew/tiddlywiki-fancybox
cpl.author: oeyoews
cpl.name: Tiddlywiki Fancybox
cpl.readme: <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> !! Readme * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-fancybox]] * [[Tiddlyhost site|https://fancybox-oeyoews.tiddlyhost.com]] !! Features * support download images, fullscreen, custom style and shortcuts, * support local images online images, mix that is also supported !! Usage <$button> Usage <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox/example"/> !! Note * need refresh on installed this fancybox plugin * if you use splashscreen, please remove `remove-when-wiki-loaded` class, otherwise this plugin will not work normally [[warn|https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/search?q=tc-remove-when-wiki-loaded]] !! TODO * support filter
cpl.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox
